items.title: Human Resources Workplace Investigations for Employee Issues
items.headline: An action guide to investigating employee issues including discrimination, harassment, theft and others (HR)
objectives_summary: Address immediate investigation needs.
How to investigate common workforce issues like harassment, discrimination, theft or threats and violence.
Help you put the right policies and procedures in place for the future.

items.headline: Management Coaching - Learn all Aspects of Coaching, Career Coaching and Executive Coaching - Master Coaching
objectives_summary: One of the most important goals is to help employees be the version of themselves. Bringing out their full potential is in everyone's best interest. This course will give you some of my best questions for coaches to help others to be more creative, productive, and successful.

items.title: Human Resource (HR) Management Comprehensive Training Course
items.headline: Gain in-depth skills and knowledge on Human Resources (HR) and become more efficient in HR Management with this course
objectives_summary: Demonstrate knowledge of the responsibilities of the HR department
Understand clearly the different roles within the HR team
Identify each stage of the employee recruitment and selection process

items.title: How to Lead Through Diversity and Inclusion

visible_instructors.name: Illumeo
visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals
visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning

items.headline: This course explores how changing demographics, globalization, and talent shortages create more diverse workplaces.
objectives_summary: Identify what Diversity & Inclusion is and recognize what it means to the workplace.
Explore "unconscious bias" and how it affects decision making.
Explore how current research has demonstrated the bottom line impact of Diversity & Inclusion.

items.title: How to Implement a Workplace Diversity and Inclusion Program

visible_instructors.name: Illumeo
visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals
visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning

items.headline: This course sets you up with the tools you need to create a workplace that celebrates diversity and inclusion.
objectives_summary: Explore the concept of diversity and inclusion and why it should be celebrated
Discover how to conduct an audit on your diversity in order to create a strategic plan for our D&I initiatives
Identify unique ways to expand the talent pool in order to expand the diversity in potential candidates, and write appropriate interview questions

visible_instructors.job_title: I'm all about learning and learning technologies

items.headline: Being able to coach staff is a must have tool for all managers who want to get the most out of their staff
objectives_summary: Recognize opportunities to build your team's knowledge, skills, abilities and confidence
Prepare for coaching discussions with your staff
Use the coaching process to conduct coaching for your team members

items.title: Diversity At Workplace
items.headline: If you want to position your business for success, hire a diverse workforce.
objectives_summary: How to Identify Stereotypes
How to Manage for Diversity
How to Deal with Descrimination

items.headline: A Learning & Development (L&D) - HR Perspective

items.title: Ethical and Professional Human Resources (HR)

visible_instructors.name: Illumeo
visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals
visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning

items.headline: This course discusses the importance of professional ethical practice for those engaging in expert and specialist roles.
objectives_summary: Discover difficult and non-standard situations to demonstrate appropriate decision making skills.
Identify the legal, ethical, and professional issues relating to working within an expert/specialist practice setting.
Explore how the organization development (OD) expert/specialist practice being undertaken has an impact on current and future implications for the profession.

items.title: Executive job search 2020
items.headline: Building a robust process for a successful job search for executives. Updated with post Covid-19 specific advice.
objectives_summary: A simple step by step process for conducting executive level job searches. Updated to include content applicable to students recently unemployed due to the Covid-19 pandemic.
A simple step by step process for the Executive Job Seeker.
ProTips from the Executive Search Industry that are directly transferable to an individual's job search.

items.title: Human Resources Strategy Bootcamp
items.headline: Strategic HR: Build a modern people strategy grounded in your business goals that differentiates your organization
objectives_summary: Create a draft HR strategy ready to validate with your leaders.
Take the relationship between HR and the CEO to the next level.
Quantify the investment required for the strategy.
